column1: Santa Rosa de Cabal is a town and municipality in the Risaralda Department
column3: on the western slopes of the Andean Cordillera Central.

column1: It is a commercial and manufacturing centre for the fertile agricultural and pastoral hinterland. Silkworms are raised in the vicinity. There are silver
A thermal pool called "Termales" is open for visitors.
Flag: Rectangle of proportions 1:2 terciated by fess white
column2: green and white. Alternatively: On a field Argent 1:2 a fess Vert.

column1: Coat of arms: Party per pale and per chevron reduced engrailed Argent
column2: Vert and Gules. In saltire over the first two fields
column3: a Latin cross bendwise Gules surmounted by an axe bendwise sinister Proper
column4: its blade upward and inward. On middle base a rose Argent barbed and seeded Or. The shield is ensigned by a three-towered mural crown Or with doors Sable. On a scroll Azure the motto 'Somos Libres' Sable.

column1: In Spanish: Escudo partido y entado en punta. Primero
column3: campo de sinople. Brochante sobre ambos campos
column4: una cruz latina de goles y un hacha en natural
column6: en campo de gules una rosa de plata con semillas y espinas de oro. Encima una corona mural de tres torres. En listel de blau 'Somos Libres' en sable.
